message: Let's start fair. I'll take 60, you get 40. We can negotiate further if you think it's unfair.
I'll start with a slightly more aggressive offer. We can adjust from here.
I'm willing to compromise. Let's split it 40/60 this time, but we need to come to an agreement soon. The money is losing value with every round.
I'm not budging much, but I'm willing to give you a bit more. Meet me halfway or I'll keep pushing for more.
I'm starting to run out of options here. Let's split it 25/75 this time, or we'll both lose a lot more in the next round.
I'm not giving up. I'll take a smaller share now to get a better deal later. Don't make me regret it.
